notes:
Negative test results reported in our API and CSVs are calculated by subtracting **Positive PCR tests (people)** from **Total PCR tests (people)**.

On December, 8, 2020, New Mexico [reported that](https://cv.nmhealth.org/2020/12/08/new-mexico-covid-19-update-daily-report-delayed-by-network-outage/) they were unable to report as usual, due to an outage of the state government internet network. The day's update will be included with the December 9, 2020 update. If it becomes available, we will backfill the December 8, 2020, data to the correct day. 

On November 18, 2020, we shifted the entire time series of New Mexico metrics by one day to match the date that the state reports on its dashboard.
name: New Mexico
